title: No, Boss-Nim!
description:
Description :
        No, Boss-nim!,  , ! at manhwawebsiteCEO Huey Hilburn seems to have everything perfectBut it has a huge weakness!In fact, he's only good at his job and incompetent in everyday life?!Lu Wen, a cold-faced secretary, is hired to fill the vacancy.But for some reasonHuey begins to care about Luwen?Maybe you like !
